bioconda.name: bioconductor-padog
bioconda.summary: Pathway Analysis with Down-weighting of Overlapping Genes (PADOG)

biotools.summary: This package implements a general purpose gene set analysis method that downplays the importance of genes that apear often accross the sets of genes to be analyzed. The package provides also a benchmark for gene set analysis methods in terms of sensitivity and ranking using 24 public datasets from KEGGdzPathwaysGEO package.

bioschemas.name: PADOG
bioschemas.summary: This package implements a general purpose gene set analysis method that downplays the importance of genes that apear often accross the sets of genes to be analyzed. The package provides also a benchmark for gene set analysis methods in terms of sensitivity and ranking using 24 public datasets from KEGGdzPathwaysGEO package.
